channel.title: Tasveer on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Tasveer on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Amazon MGM Studios-Backed South Asian-Themed Tasveer Producers Lab Launches With First Cohort (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Seattle-based nonprofit Tasveer is expanding its footprint with the launch of the Tasveer Producers Lab, a mentorship program designed to cultivate the next generation of South Asian producing talent.
